foreignData.name: Ertais Vertrauter
foreignData.text:
Instabilität
Wenn Ertais Vertrauter das Spiel verlässt, lege die obersten drei Karten Deiner Bibliothek auf Deinen Friedhof.
{U}: Ertais Vertrauter kann sich bis zu Beginn Deiner nächsten Versorgungsphase nicht destabilisieren.

name: Ertai's Familiar
originalText:
Phasing
If Ertai's Familiar leaves play, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
oo
U Ertai's Familiar cannot phase out until the beginning of your next upkeep.

rulings.text: Activating the activated ability will prevent Ertai’s Familiar from phasing out for any reason, not just due to its own phasing ability.

text:
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
When Ertai's Familiar phases out or leaves the battlefield, mill three cards.
{U}: Until your next upkeep, Ertai's Familiar can't phase out.
